title: Top DHS spokesperson who became a face of Trump immigration policy is leaving
description: Tricia McLaughlin has become the public face defending the Trump administration's mass deportation policy and immigration tactics over the past year.
content: Tricia McLaughlin has become the public face defending the Trump administration's mass deportation policy and immigration tactics over the past year.
